== Definition ==
; {{cd|smooth/}}

Appears to be a version of [[Noto Sans]] generated with [https://github.com/Chlumsky/msdfgen msdfgen]. Contains only Unicode codepoints {{mono|U+0000..U+04FF}} and {{mono|U+2000..U+20FF}}. It is not known what parameters were used to generate it. It is not known where it is used, if at all.
